<p><strong>Input Format:</strong><br>The first line of the input contains two space-separated integers <strong>N</strong> and <strong>M</strong> representing the size of the grid.<br>The next line contains a single integer <strong>Q</strong> representing the number of queries.<br>The next Q lines contain 4 space-separated integers <strong>x<sub>1</sub>, y<sub>1</sub>, x<sub>2</sub>, y<sub>2</sub></strong>.</p>
<p><strong>Output Format:</strong><br>Output <strong>Q</strong> lines, where the <strong>i<sup>th</sup></strong> line represents the answer to the<strong> i<sup>th</sup></strong> query.</p>

### Explanation

<p>In the first query, possible pairs of (A, B) are {(1, 1), (1, 3)}.<br>In the second query, possible pairs of (A, B) are {(1, 1), (1, 2), (1, 3)}.</p>
